meanings.definition: Make a public and typically formal declaration about a fact, occurrence, or intention.
meanings.sent1: She was announcing her birthday party to all her friends.
meanings.sent2: The principal is announcing the winner of the science fair.
meanings.sent3: Announcing the arrival of the ice cream truck brought cheers from the children.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm announcing its presence with loud claps of thunder.
meanings.sent5: The town crier was announcing the news with a booming voice.

meanings.definition: Serve as a sign or indication of something to come.
meanings.sent1: Dark clouds announcing rain made everyone grab umbrellas.
meanings.sent2: The first snowflakes announcing winter fell gently from the sky.
meanings.sent3: The cat announcing its hunger by meowing loudly at the kitchen door.
meanings.sent4: The distant sound of drums announcing the start of the parade.
meanings.sent5: The bright morning sun announcing the beginning of a new day.
